evidence.claim: Tender utilizes AWS for serverless architecture with Lambda functions.
Tender's data is securely stored and managed with AWS RDS written in accordance with HIPAA regulations.
The system integrates with health standards through the use of FHIR and HL7 protocols.
Tender employs an API-driven approach for its services and workflows.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 or EDI use cases found on their site.
